name: Wickerman
description: A huge construct exuding an ominous presence, designed for combat with high hit points and a flame-filled body.
memorable: Its ability to imprison opponents in its blazing body while dealing fire damage makes it a unique threat.
goals: To confront and eliminate foes while protecting its controlling staff.
relations: Linked to the controlling staff, which dictates its behavior and aggression.
environment: Typically found in areas of conflict where it serves as a guardian or adversary.
strengths: Resistant to nonmagical attacks, immune to various conditions, and capable of dealing fire damage.
weaknesses: Low armor class and dexterity makes it vulnerable to ranged attacks. Susceptible to cold damage if on fire.
attacks: Multiattack allows it to perform two slam attacks, while Blazing Ray inflicts significant ranged fire damage.
most_powerful_ability: Imprison allows it to trap foes inside its body, causing ongoing fire damage and providing total cover.
senses: Possesses blindsight with a range of 120 feet, allowing it to sense creatures without needing sight.
additional_information: Goes berserk when its controlling staff is compromised.
Inflicts fire damage on contact through Blazing Fury.
Incapacitated if its flame is doused until reignited.
Can imprison up to 6 Medium or smaller creatures inside its body.
Vulnerable to water, suffering cold damage while on fire.
test_queries: huge fiery construct that grapples foes
Wickerman grappling abilities and fire damage
monster that punishes melee attackers with fire
